name: Iconic (itch)
description:
Introducing ICONIC,

the newest way to play a twin stick shooter.

Hard to put down.

Play the game and aim to get the highest score. With non-stop levels the sky is the limit when it comes to setting your personal high score.

  Instant feedback.

Iconic has been built from the ground up with user experience in mind. Enjoy the clean and powerful feeling of the game-play.

Balance power.

With the amount of power ups there are, you must balance power with watching what's happening on screen at the same time!

Easy to play.

Pick up your favorite method to play and enjoy the smooth controls!

- Keyboard and mouse required.

- Xbox wired controller capability.

- Other formats available soon!

Constant updates.

Iconic is currently still in it's ALPHA version with planned updates coming fortnightly. 

Install Instructions.

1. unzip

2. run Iconic.exe
